text: @RepDLesko @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump There are now 20,500,000 unemployed Americans (14.7% unemployment), the worst since the Great Depression, mostly due to Trump’s failure to act on Covid-19 pandemic. Record job losses. https://t.co/vTy58XyqzT
